Hi, I'm Fran üëã. I'm a software engineer interested in both front and back end development.
I'm passionate about building scalable and maintainable software.

experience.descriptions:
Working on Capital One iOS app. Swift UI & UI Kit.
Also worked with back-end orchestration level changes. JS and Node.js based stack.
Lots of breaking down business intent into high-level mobile changes.

Working on internal web app tool, powered with Typescript, React, Express, GraphQL and Node.js.
Heavily involved with championing our Cypress testing.
Also championed and became a point of contact for some legacy code refactoring/reusing involving Finesse.
Good experience here with dealing with AWS and their Lambda serverless computing.

Was an internship experience.
Designed Java-based REST API service.
Got the service up and running from scratch, using AWS Lambda and Jersey.
Experience with Cucumber testing.
